title: #423: Epic Southern Charm Season 4 Preview
description:
Grab your mint juleps: the next season of "Southern Charm" begins next week, and we're here to break down the season 4 trailer shot by shot. Yes, we're going granular again, dissecting every.single.thing. in the preview - from the bagel pillows to that lady at the next table who thinks Landon and Thomas are soulmates. It's a FULL hour of nitpicking. We had a blast. We hope you will too! Afterwards, Crappens Mailbag!

00:00:00 - Intro / Southern Charm trailer breakdown
01:02:25 - Crappens Mailbag

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
